summary:
- This code defines a `Response` class for handling HTTP responses in an aiohttp web application.
- The class constructor (`__init__`) accepts several parameters:
  - `body` (optional), `text` (optional), and `

Response class for aiohttp web framework, handling HTTP response creation. Constructor parameters: body, text, status, reason, headers, content_type, charset, zlib_executor_size, zlib_executor. Validates mutually exclusive body/text, header handling, content-type and charset. Sets appropriate headers, encodes text to bytes, stores body. Manages optional compression settings. Provides attributes for compressed body and executor. No explicit output functions shown, but response object can be sent by aiohttp server.
